page.title: 11LLANSAMLET SCHOOL
page.content: Llansamlet school was opened in 1929 and became comprehensive in 1970.It has had 20 head teachers from Mr T. Davies to the present head Mr P. Phillips.There are 30 assistant teachers.The pupils are aged between 11 and 13 and attend Morriston Senior Comprehensive after this age.The school starts at 9.00 a.m. and finishes at 3.30.The day is divided into 10 half hour periods and begins with a 15 minute class registration period.There is a 15 minute break at 11.15 a.m. an hour for lunch from 12.30 to 1.30.At 3.30 p.m. buses take most pupils home.The school's catchment area is quite large.It includes Glais(2 miles from the school) ,Birchgrove(1 mile), Cwmrhydyceirw(3 miles) and Morriston(2 miles) as well as the village of Llansamlet.
